readable.title: 3591462960_86045906bd
readable.content: A man is roping a bull in a rodeo while others in cowboy hats watch . A man is up in the air with one hand on a bull . A rodeo rider gets tossed up into the air by a black bull as fellow cowboys look on . man getting thrown in the air while bull riding The man in black is flying off the full in front of a red fence .
